org.apache.taverna.commandline

Class CommandLineTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.commandline.CommandLineTool

  • public class CommandLineTool
extends Object
    A utility class that wraps the process of executing a workflow, allowing workflows to be easily executed independently of the GUI.
    Author:
    Stuart Owen, Alex Nenadic
